title: Flexible
body:
Hello i have recently created a club by the name of "Flexible" and i would like to focus this club on giving OCE people a way to find other's to Flex que with i don't know if it's a good idea but i would like to try it out more people i can get to join the more active and easier it would be to communicate and find groups so if you think i'm onto something and or think this might work add me and ill invite you to the group!

IGN: The Sad King or NocturnalSavage
